content: Disable your Quick Filter toolbar by a simple click on the "Quick Filter" button in the upper right corner.
creator: Mapenzi

content: Please refer to your other question at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1565121#answer-1799422.
creator: siffemoz

content: Told by whom? Blacklisting is done by email providers, not Thunderbird. Contact your email provider's support to find out why you've been blacklisted.
creator: siffemoz

content: It may help if you post a screenshot of the SMTP server settings pane. then, someone here may be knowledgeable on that server setting and can advise. thank you
creator: davidsk

content: Thunderbird does not have a white list or a black list. When all else fails, I suggest creating a filter for that individual's email.
creator: davidsk

content: Sometimes it is helpful if you post complete text of error message in English and a screenshot of the SMTP server settings pane. Thank you
creator: davidsk

content: Спасибо за подсказку, вопрос решился включением в кабинете google настройки POP, случайно обнаружил.
Thank you for the feedback. I'm pleased that it is working.
creator: davidsk
